title: Hunger, Freshness, Faith: How Tadej Pogačar and UAE Emirates Plan to Raid the Grand Tour History Books
content:
UAE Emirates lifts the lid on how it plans to solve the puzzle of the Giro d'Italia-Tour de France double: 'If any rider is capable of it, it's Tadej, with this program.'

Read the full article at Hunger, Freshness, Faith: How Tadej Pogačar and UAE Emirates Plan to Raid the Grand Tour History Books on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
